value:
It doesn't matter what world I'm in.
My purpose is to serve Lady Rhea.

It's true that I was taken to Fódlan
as a prisoner, but I have no desire to
return to my homeland, Almyra.

Shamir's the one who taught me how
to shoot a bow. She really guided me
into developing my own archery style.

The writing system in Askr looks like
the one in Fódlan. Maybe I could try
studying it...

I'll clean, do laundry, gather firewood,
tend to gardens... I'm good at taking
care of more general stuff like that.

I've got other things to do, so let's
make this quick. Got a delivery from
$Nf for you.

Lady Rhea's enemies are my
enemies. I must not lose!

Feeling pretty good about this.
But I have to keep aiming higher.

How am I supposed to help Lady
Rhea like this?

This is for me? Well, all right. I don't
really get why, but I'll do my best to
make use of it.

I'm Cyril. I served Lady Rhea at
Garreg Mach Monastery. Got any
work that needs doing at your castle?

I've dedicated my life to Lady Rhea.
She is the only reason I'm still alive.$k$pLady Rhea gave me hope and a place
to call home when I had neither.$k$pI'll never be able to repay her, even if
I spend my entire life trying to do so.$k$pThat's why I have to get stronger.
I need to be able to help her clear
every obstacle in her path.$k$pNothing brings me greater joy than
knowing I'm doing something to
support her.$k$pSo, if Lady Rhea wishes to save Askr,
I will charge into the battlefield with
all my strength.
I'm not a kid anymore.
I'll handle this.
You're in my way!
I'll show you!
How...
I'm Cyril. I'm always at Lady Rhea's call.
Hey! If you don't have anything better to do, go for a walk in the gardens!
It's my job to protect Lady Rhea.
I can see farther than most other people.
Doesn't matter if it's cleaning the floors or doing laundry... I just don't feel right unless I'm doing somethin'.
Lady Rhea... I hope I can see you again real soon.
You should just do what you can, and no more than that.
Got it.
You sure?
I'm off!
